name: The Pirates of Dark Water
overview: Set sail for a swashbuckling battle! The Pirates of Dark Water is the fighting adventure that puts you in the middle of the popular Saturday morning cartoon! Sail from island to island as one of three warrior heroes. Become Ren, the young heir to the throne and leader of the quest. Or choose Tula, the spirited heroine whose skills are as dazzling as her beauty. Or loz, the fortune hunting ex-pirate who's ready for action. Choose from one of three adventure-seeking warriors, each with unique fighting abilities! Evil bands of pirates can attack from every direction, even the foreground! Beware! Earthquakes can hit at any time and pools of Dark Water can drag you under! Humongous characters plus killer sound and graphics are hot enough to make you sweat! The battle is about to begin, so cast off! It's time for Bloth's pirates to walk the plank.
